Action.author: davidkhala
Action.body: Hi Manoel, Are you still working on it? is there any way we can automate the process that when a fabric-protos change, this .ts changed accordingly

Action.author: sstone1
Action.body: We can do this with the new version of protobufjs, using the pbjs and pbts tools. However adopting this new version requires a large piece of refactoring work, that we have just started - so it may be a while.

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: TypeScript definition generation was added as part of the move to protobufjs
